Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver

Class HFileReplicator

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver.HFileReplicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
@Private public class HFileReplicator extends Object implements Closeable
It is used for replicating HFile entries. It will first copy parallely all the hfiles to a local staging directory and then it will use (LoadIncrementalHFiles to prepare a collection of LoadIncrementalHFiles.LoadQueueItem which will finally be loaded(replicated) into the table of this cluster. Call close() when done.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private class 
    HFileReplicator.Copier
    This class will copy the given hfiles from the given source file system to the given local file system staging directory.
